name: matters-syndicator
description: Syndicate articles between local system and Matters.town

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run bundle && npm run copy-assets
scripts.dev: npm run clean && npm run copy-assets && concurrently "esbuild src/main.ts --bundle --format=iife --global-name=MattersPlugin --outfile=dist/main.bundle.js --watch" "npm run watch-assets"

author: Symbiosis Lab
